name: Lonkey Pong
description:
Project 1 from Trimester 3.

The objective was to create a Donkey Kong clone, but replace the assets with sprites that were inspired by the works of an assigned artist. My artist was Lyubov Popova.

She was a Russian artist that created work between 1910 - 1924. Her works are the style of Cubism, Cubo-Futurism and Art Nouveau.
